page.title: 09MY HOME
page.content:
My house has four bedrooms.One bedroom we use as a study.I have the second biggest bedroom. The stairs go up at the end of the hall at the side.The lounge is straight at the end.The kitchen is between the lounge and the stairs. There is a short corridor where we hang our coats.At the end is the downstairs toilet.The diningroom door is in the middle of the hall.There is a door on the other side of the hall and it leads into the garage.In the little corridor there is a cupboard. Upstairs,on one side,there is the bathroom,it is above the kitchen.We have a fitted shower next to which is a toilet.
CONTINUED ON PAGE 10
